title: 130. The Faada-Adda Conversations with Mariam Issoufou Kamara (Part I)
itunes:title: 130. The Faada-Adda Conversations with Mariam Issoufou Kamara (Part I)
description: This week, Nigerien architect Mariam Issoufou Kamara joins us in a stimulating discussion about reimagining architecture and epistemologies that come from West Africa. Kamara also touches on how African, South Asian, and other non-European can help us think out of modernity.
content:encoded: This week, Nigerien architect Mariam Issoufou Kamara joins us in a stimulating discussion about reimagining architecture and epistemologies that come from West Africa. Kamara also touches on how African, South Asian, and other non-European can help us think out of modernity.
